verses.verse: <S%H8085>Listen<s%> to this <S%H1697>word,<s%> you <S%H6510>cows<s%> of <S%H1316>Bashan,<s%> who are on the <S%H2022>mountain<s%> of <S%H8111>Samaria,<s%> who <S%H6231>oppress<s%> the <S%H1800>poor,<s%> who <S%H7533>crush<s%> the <S%H34>needy,<s%> who <S%H559>tell<s%> their <S%H113>husbands,<s%> <S%H935>"Bring<s%> us <S%H8354>drinks!<s%>"

The <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>Yahweh<s%> has <S%H7650>sworn<s%> by his <S%H6944>holiness<s%> that <S%H3117>behold,<s%> "The days shall <S%H935>come<s%> on you that they will take you <S%H5375>away<s%> with <S%H6793>hooks,<s%> and the <S%H319>last<s%> of you with fish <S%H6793>hooks.<s%>

You will go <S%H3318>out<s%> at the <S%H6556>breaks<s%> in the <S%H802>wall,<s%> everyone straight before <S%H7993>her;<s%> and you will cast yourselves into <S%H2038>Harmon,<s%>" <S%H5002>says<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh.<s%>

<S%H935>"Go<s%> to <S%H1008>Bethel,<s%> and <S%H6586>sin;<s%> to <S%H1537>Gilgal,<s%> and <S%H6586>sin<s%> <S%H7235>more.<s%> <S%H935>Bring<s%> your <S%H2077>sacrifices<s%> every <S%H1242>morning,<s%> your <S%H4643>tithes<s%> every <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H3117>days,<s%>

<S%H6999>offer<s%> a <S%H6999>sacrifice<s%> of <S%H8426>thanksgiving<s%> of that which is <S%H2557>leavened,<s%> and <S%H7121>proclaim<s%> free will <S%H5071>offerings<s%> and brag about <S%H3651>them:<s%> for this <S%H157>pleases<s%> <S%H1121>you,<s%> you children of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%>" <S%H5002>says<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>Yahweh.<s%>

"I also have <S%H5414>given<s%> you <S%H5356>cleanness<s%> of <S%H8127>teeth<s%> in all your <S%H5892>cities,<s%> and <S%H2640>lack<s%> of <S%H3899>bread<s%> in every <S%H4725>town;<s%> yet you <S%H7725>haven't<s%> returned to <S%H5002>me,<s%>" says <S%H3068>Yahweh.<s%>

"I also have <S%H4513>withheld<s%> the <S%H1653>rain<s%> from <S%H7969>you,<s%> when there were yet three <S%H2320>months<s%> to the <S%H7105>harvest;<s%> and I caused it to <S%H4305>rain<s%> on <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H5892>city,<s%> and caused it not to <S%H4305>rain<s%> on <S%H259>another<s%> <S%H5892>city.<s%> <S%H259>One<s%> <S%H2513>place<s%> was <S%H4305>rained<s%> <S%H2513>on,<s%> and the piece where it <S%H4305>didn't<s%> rain <S%H3001>withered.<s%>

So <S%H8147>two<s%> or <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H5892>cities<s%> <S%H5128>staggered<s%> to <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H5892>city<s%> to <S%H8354>drink<s%> <S%H4325>water,<s%> and were not <S%H7646>satisfied:<s%> yet you <S%H7725>haven't<s%> returned to <S%H5002>me,<s%>" says <S%H3068>Yahweh.<s%>

"I <S%H5221>struck<s%> you with <S%H7711>blight<s%> and <S%H3420>mildew<s%> many <S%H7235>times<s%> in your <S%H1593>gardens<s%> and your <S%H3754>vineyards;<s%> and your fig <S%H8384>trees<s%> and your olive <S%H2132>trees<s%> have the swarming <S%H1501>locust<s%> <S%H398>devoured:<s%> yet you <S%H7725>haven't<s%> returned to <S%H5002>me,<s%>" says <S%H3068>Yahweh.<s%>

"I <S%H7971>sent<s%> <S%H1698>plagues<s%> among you <S%H1870>like<s%> I did <S%H4714>Egypt.<s%> I have <S%H2026>slain<s%> your young <S%H970>men<s%> with the <S%H2719>sword,<s%> and have carried <S%H7628>away<s%> your <S%H5483>horses;<s%> and I <S%H5927>filled<s%> your <S%H639>nostrils<s%> with the <S%H889>stench<s%> of your <S%H4264>camp,<s%> yet you <S%H7725>haven't<s%> returned to <S%H5002>me,<s%>" says <S%H3068>Yahweh.<s%>

"I have <S%H2015>overthrown<s%> some of <S%H430>you,<s%> as when God <S%H4114>overthrew<s%> <S%H5467>Sodom<s%> and <S%H6017>Gomorrah,<s%> and you were like a <S%H181>burning<s%> stick plucked <S%H5337>out<s%> of the <S%H8316>fire;<s%> yet you <S%H7725>haven't<s%> returned to <S%H5002>me,<s%>" says <S%H3068>Yahweh.<s%>

"Therefore thus will I <S%H6213>do<s%> to <S%H3478>you,<s%> Israel; <S%H6118>because<s%> I will <S%H6213>do<s%> this to <S%H3559>you,<s%> prepare to <S%H7125>meet<s%> your <S%H430>God,<s%> <S%H3478>Israel.<s%>

<S%H3335>For,<s%> behold, he who forms the <S%H2022>mountains,<s%> and <S%H1254>creates<s%> the <S%H7307>wind,<s%> and <S%H5046>declares<s%> to <S%H120>man<s%> what is his <S%H7808>thought;<s%> who <S%H6213>makes<s%> the <S%H7837>morning<s%> <S%H5890>darkness,<s%> and <S%H1869>treads<s%> on the high <S%H1116>places<s%> of the <S%H776>earth:<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> the <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H6635>Armies,<s%> is his <S%H8034>name.<s%>"
